Detailed Description

nitf_BlockingInfo - Blocking information structure

The nitf_BlockingInfo provides information about an image segment's block organization. This structure is obtained by calling the function nitf_ImageIO_getBlockingInfo. The information in this structure reflects the correct information. Due to the implementation of some compression types the information in the image segment header may not be correct.
